tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patient_vitals (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    heart_rate INT,
    blood_pressure VARCHAR(20),
    temperature FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE SensorData (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  temperature FLOAT,
  heart_rate INT,
  blood_pressure VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  admission_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE heart_rate (
  heart_rate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  reading INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE blood_pressure (
  blood_pressure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  systolic_pressure INT,
  diastolic_pressure INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE temperature (
  temperature_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  temperature FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE oxygen_saturation (
  oxygen_saturation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  saturation_level FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
)
